sentences.en: "What time were you planning lunch?"—"Half past twelve, if that's convenient."
sentences.cn: “你打算什么时候吃午饭？”“如果方便的话，12点半。”

sentences.en: After lunch, she watched, listened and coaxed Bobby into talking about himself.
sentences.cn: 吃过午饭，她照看着博比，听他说话，哄他说说自己的事。

sentences.en: All through lunch he had carefully avoided the subject of the house.
sentences.cn: 整个午饭期间，他一直在小心翼翼地回避房子的话题。

sentences.en: Doctor Paige will be here right after lunch to see her.
sentences.cn: 佩奇医生一吃完午饭就会来这儿看她。

sentences.en: Grace laid out the knives and forks at the lunch-table.
sentences.cn: 格雷丝把刀叉摆放在午餐桌上。

sentences.en: He dashed off to lunch at the Hard Rock Cafe.
sentences.cn: 他急匆匆前往硬石小馆去吃午餐。

sentences.en: I know a wonderful restaurant where we can have lunch next week.
sentences.cn: 我知道一家很不错的餐厅，下周我们可以去那里吃午饭。

sentences.en: Mr Hastings gleefully retailed the story to Mr Anderson over lunch.
sentences.cn: 黑斯廷斯先生在午宴上兴致勃勃地把这个故事向安德森先生详述了一遍。

sentences.en: Only the extremely rich could afford to lunch at the Mirabelle.
sentences.cn: 只有非常有钱的人才能在米拉贝勒餐厅吃得起午餐。

sentences.en: Prue invited the magazine's editor to lunch and made her pitch.
sentences.cn: 普吕邀请该杂志的编辑共进午餐，推销自己的点子。

sentences.en: So the upshot is we're going for lunch on Friday.
sentences.cn: 结果是我们周五一起去吃午餐。

sentences.en: The caterers were already laying out the tables for lunch.
sentences.cn: 负责餐饮的人已经在为午餐摆桌了。

sentences.en: Tony announced it was time to see about lunch.
We had lunch the other day at our favorite restaurant.
sentences.cn: 前两天我们在最喜欢的餐馆吃了午饭。

sentences.en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
sentences.cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

phrases.tran_cn: 很随便的午饭；口味清淡的午餐
(非正式)心不在焉的，做白日梦的；发疯的；愚蠢的
做白日梦的：与真实世界没关系的；疯狂的

phrases.phrase: there's no such thing as a free lunch

trans.tran_en: a meal eaten in the middle of the day
a meal eaten in the middle of the day
